website_summaries.verdict: High top style golf shoes that have plenty of support for ankles, but they're pricey.
pros: Lace-up shoes that also have a strap across the ankle area to ensure you can tighten it properly
Available in different color and style combinations
Delivers a waterproof design that's great on the golf course, where you'll encounter wet grass
cons: Some people won't like the high top design, as it restricts ankle movement

customer_reviews.title: Made a huge difference after foot/ankle surgery
customer_reviews.text: I had ankle and foot surgery last year (2016). Golfing was tougher than I had hoped, and uneven ground was especially difficult. I tried several of my golf shoes (plenty to pick from) and none of them felt good or stable. I bought these Puma hi-tops thinking I was out of options, but what a difference these shoes have made. I am thrilled with the improvement, and I can play without the issues I had with the low tops. I am confident that I will be able to walk at least nine, and likely eighteen. These shoes are worth every penny, and I recommend them to anyone with foot and ankle issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schroder

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE BELIEVE ME!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know a lot about shoes but I KNOW when my feet feel GOOD & COMFORTABLE. NO need to break these in. IT'S LIKE PUTTING ON A PAIR OF SOFT LEATHER SOCKS! PUMA hit an ACE with this pair. NO I don't work for puma. And PLEASE BELIEVE ME! P.S. I don't know how long they'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Pain Is Good
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, been looking for a pair of high top golf shoes for awhile due to 4 ankle surgeries, these don't make my foot hurt.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Favorite golf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for a friend who was recovering from a broken ankle. He says they give him great support and are now his favorite golf shoes. He gets lots of compliments on the style.
customer_reviews.author: Sonyasings

customer_reviews.title: I love my shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my shoes. I wear orthotics which fit into the shoes which give me good arch support. The high tops have enabled me to play without wearing an ankle brace and to my surprise and delight my feet/ankles did not hurt. Best golf shoes I have ever had and I am so glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Sirois

customer_reviews.title: Well Made & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these golf shoes, the hi tops support my weak ankles, but still look great. The shoe is very well made and are very comfortable. Love the Velcro strap. Gary in Ohio
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I'm a size 9 and I ordered 9 and they fit perfect. I have arthritis in both ankles and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my shoes within 2 days. I'm a size 9 and I ordered 9 and they fit perfect. I have arthritis in both ankles and have recently had a hard time getting any weight transfer when playing golf. I laced these up and the difference from regular low cut shoes is amazing, looking to score low again. :-) Thanks Puma, Go Ricky !!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: ... I have been able to find and it was wonderful. I will buy 2 more when I see ...
customer_reviews.text: the only high top golf shoe I have been able to find and it was wonderful. I will buy 2 more when I see a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great for bad ankles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Feel great and helps with my bad ankle no more rollover with these shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Bruce lund

customer_reviews.title: Fly as hell
customer_reviews.text: If I could play as good as I look I would be on tour.
customer_reviews.author: dan curtis

customer_reviews.title: great, just as I expected
customer_reviews.text: great , just as I expected, love them .. only thing was a little upset that soon as product was on delivery price was reduced by $20;00 from the same sellor
customer_reviews.author: Larrie D'Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great. My ankle was crushed in a car accident ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. My ankle was crushed in a car accident two years ago and requires a lot of support for playing golf. These shoes together with a simple neoprene ankle brace work very well. I can play 18 holes with minimal pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Came across these and they fit perfectly and are comfortable will purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for high top golf shoes for the longest time. Came across these and they fit perfectly and are comfortable will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: fits me like a glove! Easy to put on just loosen the strings to give yourself easy slip on. Give excellent ankle support. I bought them because I had Achellies surgery last Dec. & needed support for my foot. Good traction on wet grass. I would recommend them. As good as my FootJoy DMAs.
customer_reviews.author: fred farkwater

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe -- love them but the size 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoe -- love them but the size 10 I ordered was a big on the large side. I wear thick socks and it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Larson

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these only come in a medium fit, and that is relatively tight, even for a medium .
customer_reviews.author: Recent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my bum ankle
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I have chronic lateral ankle pain and weakness. As one could imagine, golf is not the best thing for it. Have worn them once, and the comfort and support was amazing. Thanks, Rickie!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Chestney

customer_reviews.title: They were a perfect Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these golf shoes. They were a perfect Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Blair

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe and Fits True to size
customer_reviews.text: Play nine holes in them and played the best I’ve ever played they are very comfortable with no break in time and great ankle support
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes I own, and I have probably 10 pair. Finally have ankle support walking the course.
customer_reviews.author: Nick and Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the best golf shoes I have ever owned. Great fit and comfort and they look so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Notey

customer_reviews.title: size set up.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other brands, the size of these shoes is slightly large, however and for being a boot does not bother at all.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Shoes one of a kind! actually lower my HCP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for ankle support. Excellent, quality product, comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe if you need ankle support as I do
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe if you need ankle support as I do. I would like an all black version. Comfortable, they break in easily and good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R.

customer_reviews.title: Envy of the course
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I don't know why I waited so long. Comfortable and secure, does not hinder golf swing or mobility of ankle.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice golf shoe,helps with my ankles.very comfortable. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but size is at least half a size too large

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Luv them. Will Not play in any other golf shoes
customer_reviews.author: Cumby

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday present, but he's used them 3 times so far, and he loves them! He has problem ankles, and these offer great support and are comfortable to wear. Takes a bit longer to get into due to them being high tops and the strap across the top, but he's getting faster at it as he uses them. The white ones look sharp, and I'm sure he'd recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: svs

customer_reviews.title: They feel fantastic! I will be buying another pair
customer_reviews.text: I've played one round with this shoe. They feel fantastic! I will be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carraway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit like a glove and gave me the support that I needed for my ankles
customer_reviews.author: TINY C.

customer_reviews.title: provides good support. I have ankle problems and this shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: provides good support. I have ankle problems and this shoe has helped me continue with golf.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for perfect just look like they were tried on had some ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes for perfect just look like they were tried on had some creases but this is a discontinued shoe from puma and I was excited just to have them other than that they were perfect shipped early
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Mills

customer_reviews.title: Rhe hi top gives me good support.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5M in all of my shoes. A 9M in this shoe I have an 1.5 inch left to the end of the toe in this shoe. Rhe hi top gives me good support.
customer_reviews.author: SonnyJ
